feed.summary: On CNBC's "Halftime Report Final Trades," Amy Raskin of Chevy Chase Trust said Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated VRTX, has "done relatively well this year." Morgan Stanley recently reiterated Vertex Pharmaceuticals with an Equal-Weight and raised the price target from $305 to $340.
